skill.name: visual-engine-skill
skill.description: Extend and apply the Visual Experience Engine across landing pages, inspiration galleries, and demos using safe, persona-aware animations and layouts. Use when adding or modifying visual experiences.
skill.summary: Extend and apply the Visual Experience Engine across landing pages, inspiration galleries, and demos...
skill.author: CleanExpo

security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill containing no executable code. All 29 static findings are false positives. The analyzer incorrectly scanned its own output file (skill-report.json) and misinterpreted markdown formatting (backticks) as shell execution patterns. Findings labeled as C2 keywords, cryptographic algorithms, and system reconnaissance are actually common words, metadata, and accessibility documentation. The skill uses only Read, Write, Search tools and defines animation guidelines for a visual experience engine.

content.user_title: Create stunning animations and visual effects
content.value_statement: Add polished animations to landing pages and demos without compromising performance or accessibility. The Visual Engine Skill handles timing, easing, and safe motion patterns automatically.
actual_capabilities: Create beam effects, clip animations, and card transitions
Build cursor spotlight and flashlight effects
Create particle and background FX systems
limitations: Cannot generate original video or image assets
Cannot bypass performance constraints for animations

use_cases.title: Add animations to landing pages
use_cases.description: Wire pre-built animation presets into hero sections, cards, and demo pages

use_cases.title: Create visual inspiration galleries
use_cases.description: Build client-facing demos showing what their site could look like with motion design

use_cases.title: Implement Three.js 3D visuals
use_cases.description: Add 3D visual components with safe, performant animation patterns

prompt_templates.title: Basic animation
prompt_templates.prompt: Add a smooth hover animation to the feature cards using the beam effect preset

prompt_templates.title: Section transition
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a page transition using the iris reveal clip animation

prompt_templates.title: 3D component
prompt_templates.prompt: Add a 3D particle background using the starfield effect to the hero section

prompt_templates.title: Gallery flow
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a visual inspiration gallery flow that shows 5 different animation style options for client review

output_examples.input: Add a glow effect to the CTA button that triggers on hover
output: Beam effect animation applied to CTA button

output_examples.input: Create a page transition for the demos section
output: Tested on mobile and desktop viewports

best_practices: Keep all animation durations above 0.5 seconds for safety compliance
Use only CSS transforms and opacity for optimal performance
anti_patterns: Using rapid flashing animations that trigger photosensitive epilepsy
Adding disorienting zoom or rotation effects
Implementing blocking JavaScript animations that freeze the main thread

faq.question: Which platforms support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code AI assistants.

faq.question: What animation durations are allowed?
faq.answer: All animations must exceed 0.5 seconds for safety compliance.

faq.question: Can I integrate external animation libraries?
faq.answer: This skill manages built-in animation presets only. External libraries require separate implementation.

faq.question: Is user data collected or stored?
faq.answer: No data collection. This is a prompt-based skill for generating animation code.

faq.question: Why are my animations not appearing?
faq.answer: Check prefers-reduced-motion setting and verify animation is wired to correct DOM element.

faq.question: How is this different from Framer Motion?
faq.answer: This skill provides a custom animation system optimized for Synthex templates. Framer Motion can be added alongside if needed.
